metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0820 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The MediaTek Wi-Fi kernel driver in Android 6.0.1 before 2016-03-01 allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug26267358.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
